div.div: Location: Lakeside High School, 6600 Sanborn Rd, Ashtabula, OH 44004, USA - Media Center,
I checked out the new LHS Elective videos....good selection of new classes for students to enroll in for the 2018 -2019 school year. Kudos to all for their hard work in developing the new classes.
Fill out the Google form to have your Shoutout added.
